articles.title: Rural markets come back to life, automakers see significant pick-up in demand - Economic Times
articles.description: At Maruti Suzuki, dispatches of the Alto small car - a top seller in rural India - rose 42.5% to 61,767 units in the three months through November.

articles.description: Air India is close to placing landmark orders for as many as 500 jetliners worth tens of billions of dollars from both Airbus and Boeing as it carves out an ambitious renaissance under the Tata Group conglomerate, industry sources said on Sunday.
